name: Switch_Shooter
description:
Discription
  • A first-person shooting game.  
  • You got a gun can switch between two fire modes: Damage Mode and Absorb Mode. 
  • The enemies have 3 kinds of elements: water, fire and grass. 
  •  The Absorb Mode will shoot a bullet to absorb the enemy's element (but won’t deal damage). The three elements, one can restrain another (deal greater damage).
Instructions
  • Keyboard WASD to move. 
  • Mouse to aim. Left mouse button to shoot, right to swicth fire mode.
  • Hold Tab to check your status
